Publication Title: SARS-CoV-2 leverages airway epithelial protective mechanism for viral infection
Publication Authors: Allison Marie Greaney, Micha Sam Brickman Raredon, Maria P Kochugaeva, Laura E Niklason, Andre Levchenko
Publication Abstract: Despite much concerted effort to better understand severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) viral infection, relatively little is known about the dynamics of early viral entry and infection in the airway.
